<script>function replaceWithDefaultFavicon(img) {
  img.onerror = "";
  img.crossOrigin='true';
  img.src = "https://www.g2.com/assets/question-50fdf34e0856fc4dfc534e72c65f8718088b3be375f4820932d751e62057c420.png";
  return true;
}</script><script>function replaceWithDefaultImg(img, src) {
  img.onerror = "";
  img.src = src;
  return true;
}

function replaceWithDefaultThumb(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/fallback/defaultthumb-97cd53a46372b6b7058149106c7e5e3ac135a98e91b0877e430de6e8faf7e41e.png");
}

function replaceWithDefaultDetail(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/fallback/default-6632ce065b4875adb88aec465e288328b3a998ba2d0d6e27ffe5a7ea65497efc.png");
}

function replaceWithAvatar(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/icons/anonymous-avatar-purple-4ae1032bdb50ee5682003170c8184aee790d25958bd397abbd384ba52c596a7b.svg");
}

function replaceWithMonogram(img) {
  img.classList.remove('monogram__hider');
  img.classList.add('is-hidden');

  img.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex';
  img.style.display = 'none';
}</script><script>function hideBrokenImage(img) { img.style.display='none'; }</script><script>
  function preEvent(el, ev) {
    el.addEventListener('vvidget:initialized', function (e) {
      $(el).trigger(ev);
    }, false);
  }
</script>

    <div class='slat-right ai-c d-f fd-r jc-sb w-full'>
      <div>
        <span class='js-result product-name'><%= name %></span>
        <span class='vendor-name'><%= vendor_name %></span>
      </div>
      <div class='vendor-star-rating-wrapper leading-normal'>
        <img src="<%= 'https://www.g2.com/assets/icons/rating-star-baf3870c4e3d1baa6e1c5454d5db23dcdeadc56a71b81b6d7848f92b69f83bc2.svg' %>" alt="star-rating" />
        <span class='vendor-star-rating font-bold text-sm'><%= parseFloat((average_rating/2).toFixed(1)) || 'NA' %></span>
      </div>

      <input type='hidden' name='product_id' value="<%= id %>">
    </div>
  </div>

href="#modal-2820982eff721645a835"><div class="link text-base fw-semibold ml-1/2">Here's how.</div></a><div aria-modal="true" class="modal p-1" id="modal-2820982eff721645a835" role="dialog" tabindex="-1"><div class="modal-dialog modal-dialog--small"><div class="rounded-2xl bg-white p-r"><div class="modal__mobile-menu"><button class="modal-close" data-dismiss="modal"></button></div><div class="modal-header clearfix"><button class="modal-close" data-dismiss="modal"></button><div class="d-f jc-sb ai-c md:pt-1 md:px-3"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 20 23" class="align-middle xxl mr-2 icon-checkmark-shield nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><g fill="#5A39A2" clip-path="url(#a)"><path d="M6.6 10L5 11.8l3 3c.5.5 1.2.5 1.7 0L15.4 9l-1.6-1.6-5 5L6.6 10z"></path><path d="M10.8.3L10 0l-.8.3L1.5 3 0 3.5v9.2A9 9 0 005.3 21L9 22.6l.9.4 1-.4 3.7-1.7a9 9 0 0h20v23H0z"></path></clipPath></defs></svg><div class="fw-semibold text-4xl w-[350px]">We strive to keep our reviews authentic.</div></div></div><div class="modal-body"><div class="md:px-1 pt-1/2 text-midnight text-lg">G2 reviews are an important part of the buying process, and we understand the value they provide to  both our customers and buyers. To ensure the value is retained, it's important to make certain that  reviews are authentic and trustworthy, which is why G2 requires verified methods to write a review and  validates the reviewer's identity before approving. G2 validates the reviewers identity with our  moderation process that prevents inauthentic reviews, and we strive to collect reviews in a responsible and ethical manner.</div><div class="pt-1/2 <div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">4.5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack makes team communication seamless and organized. Channels keep discussions focused, while direct messages allow for quick, private conversations. The integration ecosystem is fantastic—tools like Google Drive, Jira, and Zoom plug in effortlessly. Search is powerful enough to find past conversations and shared files instantly. I also love how Slack works equally well on desktop and mobile, so I can stay connected anywhere. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">For very active workspaces, the sheer volume of notifications can become overwhelming, and important messages sometimes get buried. Threaded conversations help, but they can be easy to miss if you’re not actively following them. It would be great if Slack provided smarter filtering or AI-driven summarization of channel activity to reduce noise. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-7fca60e1" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-8ad2a698" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack centralizes team communication, replacing long email threads with fast, organized conversations. It makes it easy to collaborate across departments, share files instantly, and integrate with the tools we already use—like Jira for tracking work, Google Drive for document sharing, and Zoom for quick calls. This has reduced delays in decision-making, improved transparency across projects, and allowed remote and hybrid teams to stay connected in real time. Ultimately, it saves time, keeps everyone aligned, and helps us respond to issues faster. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-8ad2a698" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="triggerText" elv="true">Show More</span></span></div></button></div></div></div><div class="elv-flex elv-flex-col md:elv-flex-row elv-justify-between elv-pt-1 elv-pb-6 elv-gap-y-6"><div class="elv-flex elv-flex-wrap elv-items-center elv-gap-3"><div class="elv-font-figtree elv-font-normal elv-w-fit elv-h-fit elv-flex elv-items-center [&amp;>div]:[&amp;>div]:elv-px-2" data-controller="elv--tooltip-controller" elv="true"><button class="elv-rounded-pill-lg elv-p-px focus:elv-outline focus:elv-outline-3 focus:elv-outline-offset-0 elv="true">The reviewer uploaded a screenshot or submitted the review in-app verifying them as current user.</p><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="6" height="12" viewBox="0 0 6 12" </svg>
</div></div></div><div class="elv-font-figtree elv-font-normal elv-w-fit elv-h-fit elv-flex elv-items-center [&amp;>div]:elv-absolute [&amp;>div]:elv-w-max [&amp;>div]:elv-h-fit [&amp;>div]:elv-z-50 [&amp;>div]:elv-flex-col [&amp;>div]:elv-gap-1 [&amp;>div]:elv-bg-neutral-100 [&amp;>div]:elv-rounded-xs [&amp;>div]:elv-bg-opacity-90 [&amp;>div]:elv-text-xs [&amp;>div]:elv-leading-xs [&amp;>div]:elv-shadow-2 [&amp;>div]:[&amp;>div]:elv-relative [&amp;>div]:[&amp;>div]:elv-py-1 [&amp;>div]:[&amp;>div]:elv-px-2" data-controller="elv--tooltip-controller" elv="true"><button class="elv-rounded-pill-lg elv-p-px focus:elv-outline focus:elv-outline-3 focus:elv-outline-offset-0 focus:elv-outline-purple-40" aria-describedby="tooltip-d2a66b53" data-elv--tooltip-controller-target="trigger" data-action="mouseenter->elv--tooltip-controller#show focus->elv--tooltip-controller#show mouseleave->elv--tooltip-controller#hide blur->elv--tooltip-controller#hide keydown.esc->elv--tooltip-controller#hideAll" type="button"><span class="elv-max-h-6 elv-rounded-sm elv-flex elv-border elv-py-0.5 elv-px-1 elv-w-fit elv-text-sm elv-leading-sm elv-items-center elv-bg-neutral-10 elv-border-light elv-text-neutral" elv="true"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-sm elv-leading-sm elv-font-medium elv-px-1 elv-text-inherit" elv="true">Validated Reviewer</label></span></button><div class="elv-flex elv-transition-opacity elv-opacity-0 elv-duration-150 !elv-hidden" id="tooltip-d2a66b53" role="tooltip" data-elv--tooltip-controller-target="floating"><div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-leading-xs elv-text-xs elv-text-inverted elv-max-w-50" elv="true">Validated through a business email account added to their profile</p><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="6" height="12" viewBox="0 0 6 12" fill="none" class="elv-absolute elv-fill-neutral-100 elv-h-3 elv-w-[6px] elv-z-50" data-elv--tooltip-controller-target="tail">

</svg>
<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">What I like most about Slack is how easy it makes communication with colleagues. The platform brings everyone together in one place, so you can quickly send messages, share files, and get updates without switching between different tools or emails.
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack’s real-time messaging helps keep conversations flowing smoothly, whether you’re chatting one-on-one or in groups. It also offers features like channels and threads, which help organize discussions by topic or project, making it easier to find information when you need it.
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Another great thing about Slack is its accessibility. You can use it on your computer or mobile device, so staying connected with your team is simple, even when you’re on the go. This flexibility helps teams collaborate better and stay in sync, no matter where they are. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">What I don't like in slack What I don’t like about Slack is that sometimes the app experiences delays. Messages or notifications don’t always appear immediately, which can slow down communication and cause frustration during urgent conversations.
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">These delays can make it hard to keep up with fast-moving discussions, especially when working on tight deadlines or coordinating with team members across different time zones. It can also lead to missed messages or the need to repeat information.
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">While Slack is generally reliable, these occasional slowdowns affect the overall experience. Improving the app’s speed and responsiveness would make it even better for seamless team collaboration. Sometimes it has some delay in the app. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-ae790f3a" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-e3981da8" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Making communication easy with colleagues in other countries is important for smooth teamwork and successful projects. Using tools that support real-time messaging, video calls, and file sharing helps bridge the distance and keeps everyone connected no matter where they are.
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">It’s also helpful to consider time zones and cultural differences when planning meetings or deadlines. Being flexible and respectful of each other’s working hours makes collaboration more effective and shows appreciation for the team’s diversity.
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Lastly, using clear and simple language helps avoid misunderstandings, especially when people speak different native languages. Encouraging open communication and regularly checking in ensures that everyone stays on the same page and feels included. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-e3981da8" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack is the most important tool in the current work set up, as it unities all the teams, departments, and users in one place and is easy to use. Hands down the most used app of our organization - we use it all the time. 
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Features I find most useful - 
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">1) Easy integration with our most used apps - especially HubSpot!
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Our whole data is on HubSpot and any updates and urgent changes made by sales and CX on HubSpot triggers notifications on slack which keeps all the senior management informed about the key deals and escalations in real time. We are also able to do quality checks and audits via HubSpot - Slack integration and it has made everyone's life very easy. 
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">2) Direct sync with Google Calendar - whenever anyone is in the meeting, we can very check that by slack status without constantly checking the team's member calendar on Chrome. 
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">3) Huddle feature for urgent and quick calls is very useful, it's like having the phone number of the people and you can reach out to them whenever you want. Slack strengthens the collaboration and team culture. 
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">4) Love that we can emojis by ourselves - keeps it fun and interesting. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Honestly there is not much to dislike about Slack. The only thing that can get a bit overwhelming at times is the number of notifications. 
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">As an admin - I am part of a lot of channels and the constant alerts can be distracting. But with the right notification settings, it’s easy to manage and it’s not really a big issue overall. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-8126e343" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-f97d006c" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">We are a remote company and I can't imagine our operations without Slack. Slack keeps our team connected and on the same page, which is huge since a lot of us work remotely. Instead of messages, files, and meeting links being all over the place, everything’s right there in one spot. It works well with the tools we already use, like Google Drive, Asana, HubSpot so we are not constantly jumping between apps. 
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">It has cut down on long email chains, made it easier to follow conversations, and helps us respond faster when something needs attention. Overall, it has made teamwork smoother and kept everyone in sync. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-f97d006c" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">4.5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">I appreciate Slack’s intuitive interface and real-time messaging that makes collaboration effortless. The ability to create dedicated channels for different projects keeps conversations organized, while integrations with tools like Google Drive, Trello, and Zoom streamline workflows. Slack’s search functionality is excellent, allowing quick access to past discussions and shared files. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">While Slack is a great tool, constant notifications can become overwhelming without proper channel management. The mobile app occasionally lags when handling a high volume of messages and files. Additionally, the free version has limitations on message history, which can be challenging for long-term projects. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-1c3227e4" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-6f67462d" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack helps bridge communication gaps between remote and in-office teams, ensuring everyone stays updated in real time. It replaces lengthy email threads with organized channel-based discussions, making project tracking and decision-making faster. Integrations with our project management, CRM, and file-sharing tools centralize workflows, reducing the need to switch between multiple platforms. As a result, our team is more productive, collaboration is smoother, and project timelines are met more consistently. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-6f67462d" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">What I like best about Slack is its ability to centralize team communication in one place. Channels make it easy to organize discussions by project or topic, and the search function helps me quickly find past messages or files. The integrations with tools like Google Drive, Trello, and Zoom save a lot of time by reducing app switching, and the real-time messaging keeps everyone connected and aligned. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">What I dislike about Slack is that conversations can become overwhelming in busy channels. Important messages sometimes get buried quickly, and it can be challenging to keep track of action items without pinning or integrating with task management tools. Notifications can also feel excessive if not carefully customized. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-cecfdd5d" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-e1a9e455" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack solves the problem of scattered communication by bringing all team conversations, files, and updates into one central hub. This eliminates long email threads, speeds up decision-making, and keeps everyone aligned in real time. The ability to integrate with project management and productivity tools means I can take action directly from Slack, saving time and keeping workflows efficient. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-e1a9e455" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

</svg>
</div></div></div><div class="elv-font-figtree elv-font-normal elv-w-fit elv-h-fit elv-flex elv-items-center [&amp;>div]:elv-absolute [&amp;>div]:elv-w-max [&amp;>div]:elv-h-fit [&amp;>div]:elv-z-50 [&amp;>div]:elv-flex-col [&amp;>div]:elv-gap-1 [&amp;>div]:elv-bg-neutral-100 [&amp;>div]:elv-rounded-xs [&amp;>div]:elv-bg-opacity-90 [&amp;>div]:elv-text-xs [&amp;>div]:elv-leading-xs [&amp;>div]:elv-shadow-2 [&amp;>div]:[&amp;>div]:elv-relative [&amp;>div]:[&amp;>div]:elv-py-1 [&amp;>div]:[&amp;>div]:elv-px-2" data-controller="elv--tooltip-controller" elv="true"><button class="elv-rounded-pill-lg elv-p-px focus:elv-outline focus:elv-outline-3 focus:elv-outline-offset-0 focus:elv-outline-purple-40" aria-describedby="tooltip-9744d89c" data-elv--tooltip-controller-target="trigger" data-action="mouseenter->elv--tooltip-controller#show focus->elv--tooltip-controller#show mouseleave->elv--tooltip-controller#hide blur->elv--tooltip-controller#hide keydown.esc->elv--tooltip-controller#hideAll" type="button"><span class="elv-max-h-6 elv-rounded-sm elv-flex elv-border elv-py-0.5 elv-px-1 elv-w-fit elv-text-sm elv-leading-sm elv-items-center elv-bg-neutral-10 elv-border-light elv-text-neutral" elv="true"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-sm elv-leading-sm elv-font-medium elv-px-1 elv-text-inherit" elv="true">Validated Reviewer</label></span></button><div class="elv-flex elv-transition-opacity elv-opacity-0 elv-duration-150 !elv-hidden" id="tooltip-9744d89c" role="tooltip" data-elv--tooltip-controller-target="floating"><div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-leading-xs elv-text-xs elv-text-inverted elv-max-w-50" elv="true">Validated through Google using a business email account</p><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="6" height="12" viewBox="0 0 6 12" fill="none" class="elv-absolute elv-fill-neutral-100 elv-h-3 elv-w-[6px] elv-z-50" data-elv--tooltip-controller-target="tail">

<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">4.5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">I find Slack to be an excellent, daily tool for team communication and collaboration. It's chat and "huddle" (audio call) functionalities make it quick and effortless to connect with my colleagues. I always have a good connection whenever I'm in a huddle, so I have no trouble hearing. Another perk of Slack is the ability to create channels. Working on numerous projects with different teams all at once, Channels helps keep my workflows organized. It's also great that you are able to send large files through Slack, and it's faster than sending an attachment via email. Also, the integration with Zoom and Outlook has created even more efficiencies in my day-to-day! <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">While I'm generally a big fan of Slack, there are a few minor issues. The biggest challenge is managing the constant flow of information. When a channel is very active, the number of notifications can be overwhelming, often forcing me to mute the channel entirely. I've also noticed that old project channels are rarely archived, leading to a crowded sidebar that can be difficult to navigate. It would also be nice to have a wider variety of notification sound options to choose from. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-b2befb5a" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-6b38ff3d" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack primarily solves the problem of inefficient and siloed workplace communications by providing a centralized platform that reduces reliance on email.  Slack helps our teams with email overload by shifting conversations into organized, searchable channels. By integrating with a wide range of other applications like Outlook and Zoom, Slack harnesses information and workflows, improving multi-team collaboration and boosts productivity. Slacks chat messaging, audio/video calls, and search functionality create an accessible and efficient platform for our team. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-6b38ff3d" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">I like the simple and attractive user interface and different sections for DMs and Channels
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Even free version offers lot more things to do with.
</p><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Using it since last 5 months and i feel this is a best tool to be connected with professional team within the organisation. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">I think i dislike is, reply to a message takes you to different popup which i feel odd, though it is simple but but i feel it disconnect me from the conversation and always i reply to a message in a normal chat itself intead of using reply option which makes my conversation confusing. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" <div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">What I like most about Slack is how it puts all our team’s messages, updates, and files in one place, which makes it easy to keep track of everything. The search feature is really helpful for finding old chats or documents fast. I also like how Slack gives short summaries of long chats and lets you set up simple automation for repeating tasks without much effort. Plus, it connects with a lot of other apps, so we rarely have to switch between programs. This makes working together smoother and helps us get things done quickly. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">I don’t really have much to dislike about Slack. Maybe sometimes it sends a few notifications at once or takes a little time to get used to all its features. But overall, it works well for me, and I haven’t faced any big problems using it. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-1324edfe" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-2ac1d64b" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack solves the problem of messy team communication by keeping messages, files, and updates all in one place. This helps me find information fast and avoid long email chains. It also helps remote teams stay connected by organizing chats by topic. Because of Slack, I save time, share updates quickly, and focus more on work instead of searching for info. Overall, it makes teamwork easier and faster. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-2ac1d64b" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">First thing is its interface and the colorful UI, We can do everything at one place we have channels, DM's, Apps and we can create workflows.  It is very simple and The integrations with tools like Google Drive, Zoom are very useful. The search feature is super helpful as it helps me find old messages and files very quickly like for past one month <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Sometimes the Slack calling feature response is very slow and when we are on call it will automatically hung up without intimation. My profile will be getting logged out every 14 days and After editing the profile and relogging in again then the edited fields are getting lost. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-0d094fd5" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-ada2fd8e" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">First thing is we have reduced using emails because of this direct messaging and channel messaging in slack. it is like all at one place platform where we can do Audio/video calls. In the channels we can initiate threads same as in emails. It helps us stay updated in real-time and reduces confusion. File sharing and tool integrations save a lot of time. And mostly it has provided the option to integrate few apps like zoom, Drive, Gsheets etc. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-ada2fd8e" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

<div class="elv-pl-1 elv-inline-flex elv-justify-center elv-items-center" elv="true"><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none"><label class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-semibold elv-text-subtle" elv="true">5/5</label></div><div class="elv-text-center elv-justify-center elv-leading-none elv-ml-1"></div></div></div></div><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you like best about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">The best is that whenever I run into a tricky situation or need help from a team lead or manager, I can just send a quick message and usually get a response almost instantly. That kind of fast communication is a game-changer when you're trying to give timely support to customers, like via chat. It keeps everything flowing smoothly and helps us solve problems without needing to leave the chat environment. It’s honestly one of the best tools we have. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What do you dislike about Slack?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">I can't open too many tabs, Slack will stop working, and will not refresh the messages. But this is an expected behaviour, I believe. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section><div class=" js-log-click" data-controller="elv--accordion--show-more-controller" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:3437,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;bdac866e-7e0a-490c-b679-c43570cce3ce&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Slack&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:469,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-more-text-value="Show More" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-show-less-text-value="Show Less" elv="true"><div aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="show-more-trigger-47a4e2fb" class="elv-overflow-y-hidden elv-h-0" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="panel" id="show-more-panel-dc54c8fa" role="region" style="height: unset;"><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-text-subtle elv-pb-3" elv="true"><section><div class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-font-bold" elv="true">What problems is Slack solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><p class="elv-tracking-normal elv-text-default elv-font-figtree elv-text-base elv-leading-base">Slack helps me get quick approvals from team leads when I’m assisting customers via chat. If I need to take an action that requires a lead’s approval, I just open our dedicated Slack channel, select the right workflow, and someone jumps in to help right away. The workflow settings are really intuitive, so it’s easy to follow the process and get what I need without delays. Then the time to reply to the customer will be shorter, and this can increase my NPS. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></section></div></div><button data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="trigger" data-action="click->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle keydown.space->elv--accordion--show-more-controller#toggle" data-controller="elv--button-controller" data-turbo="false" aria_controls="show-more-panel-dc54c8fa" class="elv-rounded-pill-md elv-font-figtree elv-border-purple-50 elv-font-semibold elv-flex elv-flex-row elv-items-center elv-justify-center elv-transition-all elv-duration-150 elv-ease-in-out elv-text-base elv-leading-base elv-py-0 elv-px-0 disabled:elv-text-disabled disabled:hover:elv-shadow-0 disabled:active:elv-shadow-0 disabled:focus:elv-shadow-0 disabled:elv-bg-neutral-0 disabled:elv-border-0 elv-bg-transparent elv-text-primary elv-border-0 elv-rounded-sm hover:elv-text-primary-hover active:elv-text-primary-hover focus:elv-shadow-ui-focus" elv="true" type="button" style="display: none;"><div class="elv-flex elv-items-center elv-gap-0.5 elv-flex-row-reverse" data-elv--button-controller-target="textContent"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" class="elv-w-5 elv-h-5 elv-fill-current elv-text-primary" data-elv--accordion--show-more-controller-target="icon"><path d="M10 13.0625L5 8.0625L6.0625 7L10 10.9375L13.9375 7L15 8.0625L10 13.0625Z"></path></svg>

  function inview(el) {
    if (!el.getBoundingClientRect) { return; }
    var r = el.getBoundingClientRect();
    return (r.bottom >= 0 && r.top <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight));

    el.srcDone = true;
  });
